data.title: Cleanup: Imports
data.body:
Added package.d to all packages, and cleaned up imports to be only packages.

I don't feel particularly strongly about this, and it's open to discussion.

data.title: Move projection matrix out of adapter

milestone.title: Version 0.4.0
milestone.description:
## GDC Milestone

We need to have a vertical slice of the game in a playable state.

data.body: Variables such as fov, near, and far do not belong in adapter and should be in camera.

data.title: Feature: Animation System
data.body:
- Loading animation data
- Animation.d and assetanimation.d classes
- Animation shaders setup

data.title: Add Circular Studios to LinkedIn
data.body: Create a project on LinkedIn and add the group members to it.

data.title: Scale isn't working
data.body: Scaling through Yaml isn't functional. Doesn't work on initial load or on reload.

data.title: Version 0.2.5
data.body:
Added some key features so that game developers can start developing.

Related Issues:
#51, #52, #53, #55, #56, #57, #58, #59

data.title: Fix build on dub 0.9.21
data.body:
```
.dub\build\application-debug-windows-x86-dmd-B880E6FEDBA438142A4C78CE20BA0C33\sample-dash-game.obj
 Error 2: File Not Found .dub\build\application-debug-windows-x86-dmd-B880E6FEDBA438142A4C78CE20BA0C33\sample-dash-game.obj
```

data.title: One-time keypress
data.body: Currently you can only check isKeyDown every frame. There should be a bool parameter specifying a check for one-time or every frame.

data.title: Feature: Camera and Math
data.body:
Camera and Math should be working.  Please test this one carefully, as there were hours of headache put into it, and I would be lying if I said I was confident it all worked perfect.

Closes #56.
Closes #40.
Closes #39.
Closes #36.

data.title: Feature: Reload Yaml
data.body:
You can now set the `currentState` in game to `Resetting` to reload all content.

Relies on #57.

data.title: Feature: Input Bindings
data.body: You can now bind inputs to strings! [Wiki page here](https://github.com/Circular-Studios/Dash/wiki/Input-Bindings).

data.title: Cleanup: Components and Objects
data.body:
Closes:
- #44 
- #43 

Affects:
- #36

data.title: Enhance README
data.body:
Get that readme all fancied-up before GDC. This will also help as we begin interacting with the D community.

Potential Additions:
- Our Vision / Goals
- Important Wiki Links
- Links to our other repos (Speed, Sample Game)
- Engine Logo

Commits:
- 7b8923a3a16afb9dc04b089d60933f40a0a15dad: Added link to demo game.

data.title: Feature: Embedded Shaders
data.body:
Shaders are now located in shaders.d as string literals.
Also, hotfix to a lighting bug.  Things are way prettier now.
Also, merged Merge Modules pull request, so should be an easy merge after that pull request

data.title: Cleanup: Merge Modules
data.body: Merged related modules, and tweaked some imports.

data.title: Fix Travis with regards to the Sample-Dash-Game
Add real names and profile pictures to Github
data.body: Please comment here once you update your Github profiles.

data.title: Version 0.2.0
data.body: [Milestone 2 Issues](https://github.com/Circular-Studios/Dash/issues?milestone=2&page=1&state=closed)

data.title: Merge Related Modules
data.body:
- [x] Merge `Texture` into `material` module.
- [x] Merge all shaders together.
- [x] Merge Lights into a single module.

data.title: Write Documentation

milestone.title: Version 1.0.0
milestone.description: At this point, Dash should be usable by a newcomer to game development who stumbles across the engine. This includes having solid documentation.

data.body:
Commits:
- 54c0e0d900d6600efc3358f3e9fd7e1291bdca0d
- 2e06802a80e43fcbb790dd68b874d83042fba5fc

data.title: Rework binding materials to shaders
data.body: Move binding function to the shader class from material

data.title: Rework components
data.body:
- [x] Remove draw from components.
- [x] Evaluate what needs to be a component.
- [x] Implement how GameObject handles specific components

data.title: Move Shaders folder out of Game
data.body: We keep forgetting to actually do this.

data.title: Feature: Lighting
data.body: Ambient and Directional lighting works.  Also a handful of bug fixes that'll be nice to have.

data.title: Rotations are Currently in Radians
data.body: These should probably be in degrees.

data.title: Quaternion.fromEulerAngles is Broken
data.body: Quaternion.fromEulerAngles( 0, 0, 0 ) results in a quaternion representing a 180 degree rotation about the Y axis.

data.title: Rework Properties
data.body: It's causing more issues than it's worth.
